title: On string field theory for $C \leq 1$
abstract: I present a short review of our results with S.Kharchev, A.Mironov, A.Morozov and A.Zabrodin on Generalized Kontsevich model which in a sense can be interpreted as unifying ``string field theory'' for $c < 1$ minimal series coupled to 2d gravity. The problem of interpolation between different models is discussed. It is found that this problem is closely connected with ``deformations'' within the set of solutions to KP hierarchy, described by a sort of reparameterization of a spectral curve and change of asymptotics of the basis in the Grassmannian. The $c \rightarrow 1$ limit is considered along this line.
